EmailTemplate.name: Northam_Event_Defining_Data_Q115.Live Stream Reminder - Week prior
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: A New Approach to Big Data is Next Tuesday, 2/17 @ 11AM
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
DEFINING DATA IN THE CLOUD ERA A Pivotal Strategy Update HEADLINE GOES HERE AND IS ALL CAPS Thanks for registering for A New Approach to Big Data <http://www.pivotal.io/new-approach-to-big-data-livestream> via live stream.
Join the Live Stream here <http://www.pivotal.io/new-approach-to-big-data-livestream>
The event is Tuesday, 2/17 from 11:00AM to 12:30PM. If you have any questions, do not hesitate to contact us at info@pivotal.io <mailto:info@pivotal.io>.
{{my.Save The Date - Live Stream:default=edit me}}
Regards,
The Pivotal Team
